Test Case Description: Register using valid name, email, mobile number and password
Test Steps:
1. Open browser
2. Go to Goibibo registration page
3. Enter valid name
4. Enter valid email
5. Enter valid mobile number
6. Enter strong password
7. Check 'I agree to terms'
8. Click on Register button
9. Wait for processing
10. Verify redirection to dashboard
Test Data:
Name: saydfauzaan
Email: saydfauzankane2365@gmil.com
Mobile: 71262849
Password: Test@123
Expected Result: User account is created and redirected to dashboard

Test Scenario: Verify error message for existing email
Test Case Description: Try registering with an already registered email
Test Steps:
1. Open browser
2. Go to registration page
3. Enter valid name
4. Enter already used email
5. Enter valid mobile
6. Enter valid password
7. Check T&C
8. Click Register
9. Wait for response
10. Verify error message for duplicate email

Test Scenario: Verify error on invalid email format
Test Case Description: Enter an email without proper format
Test Steps:
1. Open browser
2. Navigate to registration page
3. Enter valid name
4. Enter invalid email (e.g., john.com)
5. Enter valid mobile
6. Enter password
7. Check T&C
8. Click Register
9. Wait for validation
10. Check for invalid email error

Test Scenario: Verify error when name field is blank
Test Case Description: Leave name field empty and try to register
Test Steps:
1. Open registration page
2. Leave name blank
3. Enter valid email
4. Enter mobile
5. Enter password
6. Check T&C
7. Click Register
8. Wait for validation
9. Observe the error
10. Verify name required message

Test Scenario: Verify error when password is blank
Test Steps:
1. Open browser
2. Go to registration page
3. Enter name
4. Enter email
5. Enter mobile number
6. Leave password blank
7. Check T&C
8. Click Register
9. Wait
10. Check for error message

Test Case Description: Enter a short or weak password
Test Steps:
1. Open registration form
2. Enter name
3. Enter email
4. Enter mobile
5. Enter weak password
6. Observe strength meter
7. Check T&C
8. Submit form
9. Wait
10. See weak password warning

Test Case Description: Enter mobile number with alphabets or less than 10 digits
Test Steps:
1. Open registration page
2. Enter name
3. Enter email
4. Enter invalid mobile (e.g., abc123)
5. Enter password
6. Check T&C
7. Click Register
8. Wait
9. Observe error
10. Validate mobile number format error

Test Case Description: Try to register without accepting T&C
Test Steps:
1. Open Goibibo
2. Go to sign up page
3. Enter name
4. Enter email
5. Enter mobile
6. Enter password
7. Leave T&C unchecked
8. Click Register
9. Wait for error
10. Validate T&C checkbox error
Expected Result: Error: 'You must accept terms to proceed'
